targets.query: select used_percent from disk where $timeFilter and  host =~ /$host$/ and fstype != 'gpfs' and fstype != 'iso9660'  GROUP BY path
select used_percent from disk where $timeFilter and fstype != 'gpfs' and fstype != 'iso9660' and path !~ /\/boot.*/ and path != '/jade' GROUP BY path, host
select difference(mean("bytes_recv"))/60*8 from net where host =~ /$host$/ and  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval),interface
select difference(mean("bytes_sent"))/60*8 from net where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/ GROUP BY time($__interval),interface
select total from processes where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select zombies from processes where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select last(uptime) from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select difference(err_in) from net where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/ GROUP BY interface
select difference(err_out) from net where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/ GROUP BY interface
select difference(err_in) from net where $timeFilter GROUP BY interface,host
select difference(err_out) from net where $timeFilter  GROUP BY interface, host
select usage_idle from cpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select usage_system from cpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select usage_user from cpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select usage_iowait from cpu where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select load1 from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select load5 from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select load15 from system where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select load5 from system where $timeFilter  group by host
select used_percent from mem where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select available_percent from mem where $timeFilter and host =~ /$host$/
select used_percent from mem where $timeFilter group by host

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host" WHERE time > now() - 72h
list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "host" WHERE time > now() - 72h
